website_summaries.verdict: A modest tire-shaped swing at a decent price that works well for small children.
pros: Comes with ropes and caribiner clips for attachment to swing set or other swing hook set up
Children can enjoy this, and the price is right
cons: This model is made from plastic rather than the rubber of a real tire
Harder for one child to handle on his/her town

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, hard, hollow plastic product. No good way for a single child to sit on one edge and not have it tip extremely back. We are replacing it with a basic swing seat. Definitely would not buy again or recommend anyone purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: ld

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids really like this swing. It is super light weight. It seems to be made more for kids under ten for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel's Review

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and nephew and they love it! Nice and sturdy product
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun for grand kids! Hung it in old tree in front yard!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha L. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Fun and my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great swing for the kids, they love it. It is light and easy to hang, however, I wish it had the ability to adjust the height more than a few inches up or down.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for young ones.
customer_reviews.text: Alittle light but it’s for two young boys so should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Foote

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two grandkids—- 2 and 4 yrs—- could swing together!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product. This gets used every day.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I had to spray a rubber coating on the swing because my boys kept slipping off
customer_reviews.author: Martin Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great swing for kids. Our grandson and grand daughter love it!
customer_reviews.author: Scheryl Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: My children enjoy swinging on it. And the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Oppenheim

Hanging: 56.5"(H)
Weight Capacity: 110 lbs.
Weight: 5.6 lbs.
Material: Plastic
No assembly required

ASTM-certified

BCP SKU: SKY3971
feature_bullets: SPINNING FUN: Your kids will love the breeze, so place it outside or on a door frame for swinging and spinning fun
HOLDS 2 CHILDREN: Maximize fun and minimize worry with a secure, sturdy design that can safely hold up to 2 children
HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN: Don't settle for average; this tire swing is more versatile and exciting than your standard swing set
ASSEMBLE IN MINUTES: Easy set up saves you time and energy, providing more time to spend with your children
